text: Apo Taaloot (Sauro) paakaenda nemauto, akati: “Zvirokwazvo, Allah vachakuedzai nerwizi. Saka uyo achanwa mariri, haasi wangu; uye uyo asingariraviri, ndiye wangu, kusara kweuyo anochera neruoko rwake.” Asi vakanwa mariri vese, kusara kwevashoma vavo. Asi paakariyambuka (rwizi), iye nevamwe vake vatendi, vakati: “Hatina simba zuva ranhasi kubva kunaJaaloot (Goriyati) nemauto ake.” Asi avo vaiziva chokwadi kuti vachave vanosangana naAllah vakati: “Kangani boka revashoma richikurira boka revazhinji nekuda kwaAllah?” Uye Allah vane avo vanotsungirira
